faqs.question: Will this lock me into a treatment?
faqs.answer: No. It is a planning tool. We’ll outline options from conservative polishing to printed steps or porcelain, with pros and cons for each.

faqs.question: Can I try a physical mock-up?
faqs.answer: Yes. We can print a try-in so you can feel contours and discuss refinements before any definitive work.

faqs.question: Does this work for implants or dentures?
faqs.answer: It helps visualise implant restorations and denture shapes. We’ll still explain when lab ceramics or metal frameworks are required for durability.

faqs.question: How accurate is the preview?
faqs.answer: It is based on your scans and photos. Final outcomes depend on chosen materials and clinical considerations, which we’ll review together.

faqs.question: What happens after the design?
faqs.answer: You’ll receive a clear roadmap with timings, material recommendations, and fees so you can decide at your own pace.
